p: Clearly, this is only a very partial list of the possible contributions that we can offer to the fight against SARS‐CoV‐2, but it is full of gaps that need to be filled as soon as possible. Our community has all the technical skills, scientific capabilities, and strength to help in significantly improving the knowledge of the main molecular and cellular aspects of this new infection and to help in developing a cure, based on drugs or, even better, innovative vaccines, with no fear of the SARS‐CoV‐2 threat.
